name: blinks
description: A curated list of useful links.
author: Jonathan Blades

scripts.start: npm run clean:dist-serve && parcel serve src/index.pug src/robots.txt --dist-dir dist-serve
scripts.start:management: npm run clean:dist-serve && parcel serve src/management.pug src/robots.txt --dist-dir dist-serve-management --port 1235
scripts.build: npm run clean:dist && parcel build src/index.pug src/robots.txt --no-source-maps --public-url /b-links
